modName: Skyrim Belongs to the Nords - stringent conditions for the phrase
summary: Limits  -Skyrim belongs to the Nords- and -Your kind has no place here- battlecries to Stormcloaks and Nordic members of their government.
descriptionHtml: In vanilla Skyrim, the "Skyrim belongs to the Nords" and "Your kind has no place here" battlecries are conditioned not the be shouted by members of the Imperial Legion, but other neutral people can still shout them. This mod limits them to the Stormcloaks and Nordic members of their administration.
author: LoneWolfEburg

files.name: Skyrim Belongs to the Nords Conditioned
files.fileName: Skyrim Belongs to the Nords Conditioned-53655-3-3.rar
